The average cost per plate at a wedding at Trump International Hotel & Tower Chicago is around $200. The price doesn’t just cover food — you’ll also get a tasting menu for four, a bridal changing room, a complimentary honeymoon suite, the ability to rent out blocks of rooms for guests and much more.

EXPERIENCE CHICAGO. Trump International Hotel & Tower® Chicago offers a variety of Chicago hotel packages and special offers. While every wedding is different and prices can vary greatly, the average price of a wedding at Trump International Hotel & Tower Chicago is approximately $200, exclusive of tax and gratuity. It should however, be kept in mind, that these costs are far more than just for food.
